summary.span: 定義 ASP.NET 應用程式中所有應用程式物件通用的方法、屬性和事件。

span.span: Defines the methods, properties, and events that are common to all application objects in an ASP.NET application.

summary.span: 這個類別是使用者在 Global.asax 檔案中為應用程式定義的基底類別。

span.span: This class is the base class for applications that are defined by the user in the Global.asax file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體不是由使用者直接在 ASP.NET 基礎結構中，建立類別。Instances of the class are created in the ASP.NET infrastructure, not by the user directly. 一個執行個體類別用來處理許多要求，在其存留期。One instance of the class is used to process many requests in its lifetime. 不過，它可以一次處理一個要求。However, it can process only one request at a time. 因此，成員變數可用來儲存每個要求的資料。Thus, member variables can be used to store per-request data. 應用程式會引發事件，可由實作的自訂模組介面或事件處理常式程式碼定義於 Global.asax 檔案。An application raises events that can be handled by custom modules that implement the interface or by event handler code that is defined in the Global.asax file. 實作的自訂模組介面可放在 App_Code 資料夾或 [Bin] 資料夾中的 DLL。Custom modules that implement the interface can be put in the App_Code folder or in a DLL in the Bin folder. .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). > [!NOTE] > 當執行 IIS 7.0 整合模式中，在 App_Code 資料夾或 [bin] 資料夾中的自訂模組套用至要求管線中的所有要求。When running IIS 7.0 in Integrated mode, custom modules in the App_Code folder or Bin folder apply to all requests in the request pipeline. Global.asax 檔案中的事件處理常式程式碼僅適用於會對應到 ASP.NET 處理常式的要求。Event handler code in the Global.asax file only applies to requests that are mapped to an ASP.NET handler. 應用程式事件會依照下列順序引發：The application events are raised in the following order: 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. 6. 7. 之後事件，以及之前事件建立事件處理常式 （這是對應至要求 URL 的頁面）。After the event and before the event, an event handler (which is a page that corresponds to the request URL) is created. 當伺服器執行 IIS 7.0 整合模式中，而是在最低.NET Framework 3.0 版，就會引發事件。When a server is running IIS 7.0 in Integrated mode and at least the .NET Framework version 3.0, the event is raised. 當伺服器執行 IIS 7.0，以傳統模式或較早版本的 IIS 時，就無法處理此事件。When a server is running IIS 7.0 in Classic mode or an earlier version of IIS, this event cannot be handled. 8. 9. 10. 11. 事件處理常式會執行。The event handler is executed. 12. 13. 14. 之後就會引發事件，任何現有的回應篩選器會篩選輸出。After the event is raised, any existing response filters will filter the output. 15. 16. 17. 。. 此事件與 IIS 7.0 整合模式中支援最低.NET Framework 3.0This event is supported in IIS 7.0 Integrated mode and at least the .NET Framework 3.0 18. 此事件是支援的 IIS 7.0 整合式模式且至少.NET Framework 3.0This event is supported IIS 7.0 Integrated mode and at least the .NET Framework 3.0 19. ## Examples 下列兩個範例示範如何使用類別和其事件。The following two examples demonstrate how to use the class and its events. 第一個範例示範如何建立自訂 HTTP 模組，並將事件連接到它。The first example demonstrates how to create a custom HTTP module and connect an event to it. 第二個範例示範如何修改 Web.config 檔案。The second example demonstrates how to modify the Web.config file. 下列範例示範如何建立自訂 HTTP 模組，並連接HTTP 模組事件。The following example demonstrates how to create a custom HTTP module and connect the event to the HTTP module. HTTP 模組攔截每個 Web 應用程式資源，藉此讓您篩選用戶端要求的要求。HTTP modules intercept each request to Web application resources, thereby allowing you to filter client requests. 訂閱任何 HTTP 模組事件必須實作介面。Any HTTP module that subscribes to an event must implement the interface. [!code-csharp[System.Web.HttpApplication1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpApplication1/cs/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.HttpApplication1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.HttpApplication1/vb/source.vb#1)] 自訂 HTTP 模組中的事件發生之前，您必須修改 Web.config 檔案中的組態設定，HTTP 模組會通知 ASP.NET。Before an event in a custom HTTP module can occur, you must modify the configuration settings in the Web.config file to notify ASP.NET about the HTTP module. 下列範例示範中的適當的組態設定`httpModules`Web.config 檔案區段。The following example shows the appropriate configuration setting in the `httpModules` section of the Web.config file. 下列設定適用於 IIS 7.0 傳統模式和較早版本的 IIS。The following setting applies to IIS 7.0 Classic mode and to earlier versions of IIS. ```csharp ``` ```vb ``` 下列設定適用於 IIS 7.0 整合模式。The following setting applies to IIS 7.0 Integrated mode. ```csharp ``` ```vb ```

summary.span: 當 ASP.NET 取得與目前要求關聯的目前狀態 (例如，工作階段狀態) 時發生。

span.span: Occurs when ASP.NET acquires the current state (for example, session state) that is associated with the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建立事件處理常式之後，會引發事件。The event is raised after the event handler has been created. [就會引發事件時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)物件所繫結至資料的項目。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). ## Examples 如需處理的範例事件，請參閱概觀主題。For an example of handling the event, see the overview topic.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 所引發的例外狀況可以存取事件，藉由呼叫方法。The exception that raises the event can be accessed by a call to the method. 如果您的應用程式會產生自訂的錯誤輸出，隱藏呼叫 ASP.NET 所產生的預設錯誤訊息方法。If your application generates custom error output, suppress the default error message that is generated by ASP.NET by a call to the method. > [!NOTE] > 如果您的 Web 應用程式包含 XML Web service，您無法使用這些服務的全域例外狀況處理的事件。If your Web application contains XML Web services, you cannot use the event for global exception handling of those services. XML Web service 的 HTTP 處理常式會取用任何例外狀況，就會發生在 XML Web service，並將它轉換成 SOAP 錯誤之前所呼叫。The HTTP handler for XML Web services consumes any exception that occurs in an XML Web service and converts it to a SOAP fault before the being called. 若要處理 XML Web 服務例外狀況，請建置 SOAP 擴充功能來處理自訂的全域例外狀況處理常式中的 Web 服務例外狀況。To handle XML Web service exceptions, build a SOAP extension to process Web service exceptions in a custom global exception handler. [就會引發事件時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)物件所繫結至資料的項目。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67).

summary.span: 取得設定用於網站之預設輸出快取提供者的名稱。

span.span: Gets the name of the default output-cache provider that is configured for a Web site.
The name of the default provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以覆寫這個方法，並使用它來傳回已針對網站上的任何輸出快取提供者的名稱。You can override this method and use it to return the name of any output-cache provider that is configured for a Web site. ASP.NET 會擷取具名提供者的參考，並使用它來儲存目前正在執行要求的輸出快取資料。ASP.NET retrieves a reference to the named provider and uses it to store output-cache data for the currently executing request. 根據預設，在 ASP.NET 中，所有的 HTTP 回應，呈現頁面和控制項使用記憶體中輸出快取。By default, in ASP.NET, all HTTP responses, rendered pages, and controls use the in-memory output cache. 您可以變更藉由指定不同的提供者名稱用於 Web 應用程式的預設輸出快取提供者`defaultProvider`。You can change the default output-cache provider that is used for a Web application by specifying a different provider name for `defaultProvider`. 此外，您可以選取個別的控制項，並針對個別要求不同的輸出快取提供者。In addition, you can select different output-cache providers for individual control and for individual requests. 選擇不同的輸出快取提供者，針對不同的 Web 使用者控制項的最簡單方式是使用新因此以宣告方式執行`providerName`屬性中的頁面或控制項指示詞，如下列範例所示：The easiest way to choose a different output-cache provider for different Web user controls is to do so declaratively by using the new `providerName` attribute in a page or control directive, as shown in the following example: ``` <%@ OutputCache Duration="60" VaryByParam="None" providerName="DiskCache" %> ``` 若要指定不同的輸出快取提供者針對 HTTP 要求，您已覆寫這個方法，以程式設計方式指定要用於特定的要求哪一個提供者的 Global.asax 檔案中。To specify a different output cache provider for an HTTP request, you override this method in the Global.asax file to programmatically specify which provider to use for a specific request. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [ASP.NET 快取概觀](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Caching Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5ec28012-4972-4dc3-b3e8-9d20401fe11d). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何以程式設計方式指定名為快取提供者`DiskCache`Advanced.aspx 頁面會進入任何 HTTP 要求。The following example shows how to programmatically specify the cache provider named `DiskCache` for any HTTP request that goes to the Advanced.aspx page. ```csharp public override string GetOutputCacheProviderName(HttpContext context) { if (context.Request.Path.EndsWith("Advanced.aspx")) return "DiskCache"; else return base.GetOutputCacheProviderName(context); } ``` ```vb Public Overloads Overrides Sub GetOutputCacheProviderName(ByVal context _ As HttpContext) As String If context.Request.Path.EndsWith("Advanced.aspx") Then Return "DiskCache" Else Return MyBase.GetOutputCacheProviderName(context) End If End Sub ```

span.span: is or is an empty string.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 即使發生錯誤，就會引發事件。The event is raised even if an error occurs. 您可以提供的事件處理常式提供要求的自訂記錄的事件。You can provide an event handler for the event to provide custom logging for the request. [就會引發事件時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)物件所繫結至資料的項目。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). .NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。 is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[版本和相依性](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md)。For more information, see [Versions and Dependencies](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/versions-and-dependencies.md). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何提供的事件處理常式事件。The following example demonstrates how to provide an event handler for the event. 事件處理常式也會處理多個其他事件。The event handler also handles several other events. 因此，和屬性用來判斷要執行的程式碼。Therefore, the and properties are used to determine what code to run. summary.span: 正好發生於 ASP.NET 傳送內容給用戶端時。

span.span: Occurs just before ASP.NET sends content to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 事件可能會發生多次。The event may occur multiple times. [就會引發事件時](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67)物件所繫結至資料的項目。For more information about how to handle events, see [NIB: Consuming Events](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01e4f1bc-e55e-413f-98c7-6588493e5f67). > [!WARNING] > 請勿使用`PreSendRequestContent`實作的受管理模組使用`IHttpModule`。Do not use `PreSendRequestContent` with managed modules that implement `IHttpModule`. 設定這些屬性會導致發生問題的非同步要求。Setting these properties can cause issues with asynchronous requests. 應用程式要求路由 (ARR) 和 websockets 的組合可能會導致存取違規例外狀況會導致損毀的 w3wp。The combination of Application Requested Routing (ARR) and websockets might lead to access violation exceptions that can cause w3wp to crash. 比方說，iiscore ！W3_CONTEXT_BASE::GetIsLastNotification + 68 iiscore.dll 中的造成存取違規例外 (0xC0000005)。For example, iiscore!W3_CONTEXT_BASE::GetIsLastNotification+68 in iiscore.dll has caused an access violation exception (0xC0000005).
